sections.heading: Repealed.Section 7-19A-2 - Repealed
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1986, ch. 20, § 136E repealed 7-19A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1984, ch. 3, § 1, relating to the short title of the Special Municipal Gross Receipts Tax Act, effective July 1, 1996. For provisions of the former section,seethe 1995 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
